content: Although most people thought of the Bible as a compendium of inspirational thought and Near Eastern traditions, an American school board wanted to declare it a science textbook.
translations: ita:Sebbene la maggior parte delle persone ritenesse la Bibbia un compendio di pensieri ispiratori e tradizioni del Vicino O
